models.ShippingRoute: Pre-configured shipping routes between locations with transit times and costs.
models.SalesForecast: Simplified daily sales rate per product per location. Auto-calculated with manual override option.
models.ForecastAdjustment: Date range with effect (exclude or multiply) to adjust forecast calculations. Can be account-wide or product-specific.
models.AccountForecastAdjustment: Account-level forecast adjustments that apply to all products by default.
models.ProductForecastAdjustment: Product-specific adjustments that can override or opt-out of account adjustments.
models.ReplenishmentSuggestion: Generated recommendations to transfer inventory or place purchase orders.
models.DashboardSummary: Aggregated metrics for the dashboard overview.

relationships: SalesForecast belongs to a Product and Location
AccountForecastAdjustment applies to all products by default
ProductForecastAdjustment can override or opt-out of AccountForecastAdjustment
ReplenishmentSuggestion references Product, Location, and Route

forecastModelConfigs.name: 30-Day Moving Average
forecastModelConfigs.description: Simple average of the last 30 days. Best for stable products with minimal trend.

forecastModelConfigs.name: 14-Day Moving Average
forecastModelConfigs.description: Simple average of the last 14 days. More responsive to recent changes.

forecastModelConfigs.name: Exponential Smoothing (=0.3)
forecastModelConfigs.description: Weighted average favoring recent data. Good for products with gradual trend changes.

forecastModelConfigs.name: Weekly Seasonal Naive
forecastModelConfigs.description: Uses same day of week pattern. Best for products with strong weekday/weekend differences.

forecastModelConfigs.name: Holt-Winters Weekly
forecastModelConfigs.description: Triple exponential smoothing with weekly seasonality. Best for products with trend AND weekly patterns.

accountForecastAdjustments.name: Black Friday Weekend
accountForecastAdjustments.notes: Peak shopping period - expect 50% increase in sales

accountForecastAdjustments.name: Christmas Week
accountForecastAdjustments.notes: Warehouse closed, no reliable sales data

accountForecastAdjustments.name: Prime Day
accountForecastAdjustments.notes: Amazon Prime Day - expect 100% increase in sales
